frame.name: Shapes
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame contains words which describe the dimensional extent and <fen>Shape</fen> of a <fen>Substance</fen>. These words do not make reference to a Part-whole relationship. There can also be a descriptor of the <fen>Shape</fen>, <fen>Shape_prop</fen>.
<ex>She held a <t><fex name="Shape">square</fex></t> <fex name="Substance">of cloth </fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Substance
FE.definition: <def-root>A <fen>Substance</fen> of which pieces can be extracted.<ex>Sue ate a <fex name="Shape_prop">big</fex> <t><fex name="Shape">square</fex></t> <fex name="Substance">of cake</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Shape
FE.definition: <def-root>This is the <fen>Shape</fen> that the <fen>Substance</fen> is in.<ex>I ate a <t><fex name="Shape">stick</fex></t> <fex name="Substance">of butter</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Shape_prop
FE.definition: <def-root>This describes a property of the <fen>Shape</fen>, e.g. it's size.<ex>Sue ate a <fex name="Shape_prop">big</fex> <t><fex name="Shape">square</fex></t> <fex name="Substance">of cake</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Count
FE.definition: <def-root>The number of units of the measured <fen>Substance</fen>. <ex>Serena found <fex name="Count">two</fex> <t><fex name="Shape">squares</fex></t> <fex name="Substance">of coth</fex> in the cabinet.</ex></def-root>
